titles.title: A resolution celebrating the centennial year of the birth of Jan Karski and honoring his extraordinary and courageous life.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: 12/4/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Celebrates 2014 as the centennial year of the birth of Jan Karski, and honors his life and legacy.
